document.full_text: rajat k. gupta, a former goldman sachs director, told raj rajaratnam that the bank might acquire wachovia or a.i.g., according to a wiretapped phone call.
document.title: on tape, galleon founder told of possible goldman deals
lines_and_colors: rajat k. gupta, a former goldman sachs director, told raj rajaratnam that the bank might acquire wachovia or a.i.g., according to a wiretapped phone call.
